column20: Charged Attack: Performs up to 5 rapid strikes.
column21: Plunging Attack: Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to unleash a flurry of sword ki.
column280: Amatsumi Kunitsumi Sanctification: After using Kamisato Art: Hyouka, Kamisato Ayaka's Normal and Charged Attacks deal 30% increased DMG for 6s.
column281: Kanten Senmyou Blessing: When the Cryo application at the end of Kamisato Art: Senho hits an opponent, Kamisato Ayaka gains the following effects: • Restores 10 Stamina • Gains 18% Cryo DMG Bonus for 10s.
column282: Snowswept Sakura: When Kamisato Ayaka's Normal or Charged Attacks deal Cryo DMG to opponents, it has a 50% chance of decreasing the CD of Kamisato Art: Hyouka by 0.3s. This effect can occur once every 0.1s.
column283: Blizzard Blade Seki no To: When casting Kamisato Art: Soumetsu, unleashes 2 smaller additional Frostflake Seki no To, each dealing 20% of the original storm's DMG.
column284: Frostbloom Kamifubuki: Increases the Level of Kamisato Art: Soumetsu by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.
column285: Ebb and Flow: Opponents damaged by Kamisato Art: Soumetsu's Frostflake Seki no To will have their DEF decreased by 30% for 6s.
column286: Blossom Cloud Irutsuki: Increases the Level of Kamisato Art: Hyouka by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.
column287: Dance of Suigetsu: Kamisato Ayaka gains Usurahi Butou every 10s, increasing her Charged Attack DMG by 298%. This buff will be cleared 0.5s after Ayaka's Charged ATK hits an opponent, after which the timer for this ability will restart.
